verses.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.transliteration: Illa alladhina amanu wa 'amilu as-salihati wa tawasaw bil-haqqi wa tawasaw bis-sabr
verses.translation: Except those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience
